analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xec5bd84f0b948df947ff5846eb3c443d6ca29baa.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xec5bd84f0b948df947ff5846eb3c443d6ca29baa.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xec5bd84f0b948df947ff5846eb3c443d6ca29baa.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
